SEARCH
Package database

Class jdbc

java.lang.Object
database.jdbc
public class jdbc extends Object
The jdbc class provides methods to interact with the database.

  • Method Details

    • validateLogin

      public static User validateLogin(String email, String password)
      Validates user login credentials.
      Parameters:
      email - The user's email
      password - The user's password
      Returns:
      The User object if login is successful, otherwise null

    • register

      public static int register(String nickname, String email, String password)
      Registers a new user.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The user's nickname
      email - The user's email
      password - The user's password
      Returns:
      1 for successful registration, 2 if nickname already exists, 3 if email already exists, 0 for failure

    • getAccountsByUserId

      public static ArrayList<Account> getAccountsByUserId(int userid)
      Retrieves accounts associated with a user.
      Parameters:
      userid - The user ID
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Account objects associated with the user

    • getTransactionsByAccountID

      public static ArrayList<Transaction> getTransactionsByAccountID(int id)
      Retrieves transactions associated with an account.
      Parameters:
      id - The account ID
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Transaction objects associated with the account

    • insertTransaction

      public static void insertTransaction(Transaction transaction)
      Inserts a new transaction into the database.
      Parameters:
      transaction - The transaction to insert

    • deleteTransaction

      public static void deleteTransaction(Transaction transaction)
      Deletes a transaction from the database.
      Parameters:
      transaction - The transaction to delete

    • deleteAccount

      public static void deleteAccount(int accountId)
      Deletes an account from the database.
      Parameters:
      accountId - The ID of the account to delete

    • updateTransaction

      public static void updateTransaction(Transaction transaction)
      Updates a transaction in the database.
      Parameters:
      transaction - The transaction to update

    • addNewAccount

      public static Account addNewAccount(int userId, String accountName)
      Adds a new account for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID
      accountName - The name of the new account
      Returns:
      The newly added Account object, or null if the addition fails
